Sentencas: In this study, a solid oxide electrolyzer cell (SOEC) stack model is developed based on an alternative mapping concept.
Titulo: A study on solid oxide electrolyzer stack and system performance based on alternative mapping models

Sentencas: The SOEC stack performance in a commercial hot box is systematically studied under different operating currents, flow rates, and flow directions.
Titulo: A study on solid oxide electrolyzer stack and system performance based on alternative mapping models

Sentencas: The results revealed that the SOEC stack operated in a hot box has thoroughly different temperature distributions, resulting in additional efficiency losses and an increase in thermal neutral voltage.
Titulo: A study on solid oxide electrolyzer stack and system performance based on alternative mapping models

Sentencas: The SOEC stack model computation results are summarized into stack performance diagrams and used in the system design.
Titulo: A study on solid oxide electrolyzer stack and system performance based on alternative mapping models

Sentencas: A 6-Nm(3)/h SOEC system with preheaters and recycling cathode materials is designed, and its performance is studied.
Titulo: A study on solid oxide electrolyzer stack and system performance based on alternative mapping models

Sentencas: The system efficiency is greatly influenced by the steam generator, and an external steam source can help increase the total efficiency of the system to more than 83%.
Titulo: A study on solid oxide electrolyzer stack and system performance based on alternative mapping models

Sentencas: Even the current increase may deteriorate the stack performance.
Titulo: A study on solid oxide electrolyzer stack and system performance based on alternative mapping models

Sentencas: It can increase the SOEC system efficiency by saving energy in the steam generator and preheaters.
Titulo: A study on solid oxide electrolyzer stack and system performance based on alternative mapping models

Sentencas: An increase in the flow rate around anode and cathode can improve the system capacity and efficiency.
Titulo: A study on solid oxide electrolyzer stack and system performance based on alternative mapping models

Sentencas: The sys-tem's maximum capacity is limited by the preheater heat balance and the stack output temperature.
Titulo: A study on solid oxide electrolyzer stack and system performance based on alternative mapping models

Sentencas: The feasible maximum system capacity is 33.4 kW electrolysis electric power input and 9.93 Nm(3)/h hydrogen production rate.
Titulo: A study on solid oxide electrolyzer stack and system performance based on alternative mapping models

Sentencas: At a constant system capacity, decreasing the air flow rate can minimize the heat losses in anode off-gas and achieve more than 87% nonsteam system efficiency.
Titulo: A study on solid oxide electrolyzer stack and system performance based on alternative mapping models
